snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo revealed the details of a 10-part initiative that could cement his reputation as a defender of women’s equality.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo unveils his long-promised Women’s Equality Act, 10-point plan that could reclaim state's progressive mantle and cement his reputation as a defender of women's rights; plan's controversial element would guarantee woman's right to an abortion as established by 1973 Supreme Court decision Roe v Wade.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo revealed the details of a 10-part initiative that could cement his reputation as a defender of women’s equality.

headline.seo: Cuomo Women’s Rights Plan May Hinge on Abortion Proposal
headline.main: Cuomo Women’s Rights Plan May Hinge on Abortion Proposal
headline.print_headline: Women’s Rights Plan May Hinge on Abortion Proposal
